n0:createOracleTrigger.n0:source:
CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TRIGGER "SAMPLE_CUSTOMERS"."BD_EBA_CUST_CONTACTS" before delete on eba_cust_contacts for each row begin eba_cust_fw.tag_sync( p_new_tags => null, p_old_tags => :old.tags, p_content_type => 'CONTACT', p_content_id => :old.id ); end;
ALTER TRIGGER "SAMPLE_CUSTOMERS"."BD_EBA_CUST_CONTACTS" ENABLE
